answers.answer: Hi there -Do you want the whole tracker, or just a place to display stats?Thanks,Emily
Would like to accept the tracker as an app with all the graphs
Hi,There currently isn't a way to embed the tracker in another site.  We have forwarded this as a request, however, and our engineers are looking into it.  Thanks so much!

Also - can you tell us your website?  If you don't want to post it here you can send it to me (or any other moderator) via private message or can use the "Contact Us" link at the bottom of the page to send it.  Thanks!

Hi there,I will surely let you know the web site once it is complete, we are still in the stage of finalizing things before the launch. It is meant for senior citizens. I have actually written apps for monitoring health vital parameters, but I trust your apps more because it is done in consultation with the medical community experts. Thank you so much for the support and I hope you will be able to arrange so that we can embed your tracker in our site.
Hi there -I have some info for you, and am sending you a PM about it.Emily

question: I would like to add the blood pressure, diabetes, weight, exercise tracker as web apps /gadgets in my website pls let me know how this is possible.
title: Embedding blood pressure tracker
